resources.name: Actualiza el time slot con el id correspondiente
TimeSlot
resources.description: Turnos que tiene disponibles un mentor

resources.name: Obtiene un time slot por id
Obtiene todos los time slots de un user
Obtiene todos los time slots de un user para un date especifico
Obtiene todas las mentorías de un user

resources.contents:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: "Meh"
  version: 0.0.1
  title: Calomentor
  contact:
    email: frontendcafe@gmail.com
servers:
  - url: https://gnoqe5kho1.execute-api.sa-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev
  - url: http://localhost:3001/dev
security:
  - ApiKeyAuth: []
externalDocs:
  description: Datos sobre el proyecto
  url: "https://github.com/hifrontendcafe/calomentor"
tags:
  - name: Mentorship
    description: Mentoría
  - name: TimeSlot
    description: Turnos que tiene disponibles un mentor

paths:
  /sf/mentorship:
    post:
      tags:
        - Mentorship
      summary: Crea una mentoria
      description: "Crea una mentoria y dispara los eventos de confirmacion y recordatorios 2 hs antes de la mentoria"
      operationId: addMentorship
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Mentorship"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Mentoría creada
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: number
                    enum:
                      - 200
                  info:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - "OK"
        "403":
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
  /mentorship/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Mentorship
      summary: Obtiene todas las mentorías de un user
      operationId: getMentorshipsByUser
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Id del user
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 364256538056982528
        - name: filter
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - "ACTIVE"
              - "CANCEL"
              - "CONFIRMED"
        - name: filterDates
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - "PAST"
              - "FUTURE"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/MentorshipList"
        "400":
          description: Invalid status value
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
  /time-slot/user/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - TimeSlot
      summary: Obtiene todos los time slots de un user
      operationId: getTimeSlotsByUser
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Id del user
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 364256538056982528
        - name: "slot_date"
          description: Fecha a buscar (Opcional, por defecto null, trae todos los slots para el user_id ), ECMAScript date
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: "only_free"
          description: Trae las mentorías no ocupadas
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/TimeSlotList"
        "400":
          description: Invalid status value
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
  /time-slot/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - TimeSlot
      summary: Obtiene un time slot por id
      operationId: getTimeSlot
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Id del time slot
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "ccb98c48-c03e-4091-acce-fa719f08bd4b"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/TimeSlot"
    patch:
      tags:
        - TimeSlot
      summary: Actualiza el time slot con el id correspondiente
      operationId: updateTimeSlot
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Id del time slot
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "ccb98c48-c03e-4091-acce-fa719f08bd4b"
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/UpdateTimeSlot"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/TimeSlot"
  /time-slot:
    post:
      tags:
        - TimeSlot
      summary: Crea nuevo time slot
      operationId: addTimeSlot
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/TimeSlot"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/TimeSlot"
      
components:
  securitySchemes:
    ApiKeyAuth:
      type: apiKey
      in: header
      name: X-API-KEY
  responses:
    MentorshipList:
      description: Retorna las mentorías del mentor
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/MentorshipListResponse"
    TimeSlotList:
      description: Retorna los time slots del mentor
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/TimeSlotListResponse"
    TimeSlot:
      description: Time slot
    Forbidden:
      description: Forbidden
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
              message:
                type: string
                enum:
                  - Forbidden
  requestBodies:
    UpdateTimeSlot:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/UpdateTimeSlotRequest"
    TimeSlot:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/TimeSlotRequest"
    Mentorship:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/MentorshipRequest"
  schemas:
    BasicTimeSlot:
      type: object
      properties:
        is_occupied:
          type: boolean
        date:
          type: number
        is_cancelled:
          type: boolean
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
    BasicMentorship:
      type: object
      required:
        - mentor_id
        - mentee_id
        - mentee_name
        - mentee_username_discord
        - mentee_email
      properties:
        mentor_id:
          type: string
          example: "706602792005140532"
          description: discord id
        mentee_id:
          type: string
          example: "706602792005140532"
          description: discord id
        mentee_name:
          type: string
          example: "Santiago Santana"
        mentee_username_discord:
          type: string
          example: "Santiago Santana#2098"
        mentee_email:
          type: string
          example: "example@example.com"
        info:
          type: string
          description: información adicional (opcional)
          example: "Taba aburrido y me anoté"
    MentorshipResponse:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/BasicMentorship'
        - type: object
          properties:
            id:
              type: string
              format: uuid
              example: "af8cf24c-6cfe-4483-92d9-16873578f6d2"
            mentorship_status:
              type: string
              enum:
                - CANCEL
                - ACTIVE
                - CONFIRMED
              example: CANCEL
            mentor_email:
              type: string
              example: "example@example.com"
            mentor_name:
              type: string
              example: "Santiago Santana"
            feedback_mentor:
              type: string
            feedback_mentee:
              type: string
            feedback_stars:
              type: number
            cancel_cause:
              type: string
            tokenForCancel:
              type: string
            who_cancel:
              type: string
              enum:
                - MENTOR
                - MENTEE
            time_slot_info:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BasicTimeSlot'
    TimeSlotResponse:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/BasicTimeSlot'
        - type: object
          properties:
            tokenForCancel:
              type: string
            user_id:
              type: string
              example: "706602792005140532"
              description: discord mentor id
            mentee_id:
              type: string
              example: "706602792005140532"
              description: discord mentee id
            mentee_username_discord:
              type: string
              example: "Santiago Santana#2098"
    MentorshipListResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
          example: "OK."
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/MentorshipResponse'
    TimeSlotListResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
          example: "Success"
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TimeSlotResponse'
    TimeSlotRequest:
      type: object
      required:
        - user_id
        - slot_date
      properties:
        user_id:
          type: number
        slot_date:
          description: ECMAScript epoch https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Date#the_ecmascript_epoch_and_timestamps
          type: number
    MentorshipRequest:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/BasicMentorship'
        - type: object
          required:
            - time_slot_id
            - time_slot_time
          properties:
            time_slot_id:
              type: string
              format: uuid
            time_slot_time:
              type: number
              description: Hora en utc-0
    UpdateTimeSlotRequest:
      type: object
      required:
        - is_occupied
      properties:
        is_occupied:
          type: boolean
